page.title: 09CHILDREN IN ESKDALEMUIR
page.content: It's a lovely life for children in Eskdalemuir _ country air,goats milk, free_range hens eggs,pets to cherish , ponies to ride ,sledging in the snow. There's a play group in the village hall for the under fives, sometimes joining in the nearby town centre activities.Sports day in summer. "Halloween, special! Dressed in ghostie or witches costume, disguised and masked we go from house, recite our poems , sing our songs , and then ,oh joy! fill our pillow cases with sweets nuts,apples ,oranges an cake." Guy Fawkes Day sees a bonfire built built by eager beavers weeks before. Fireworks are followed by cocoa and biscuits. Christmas! a party in the hall. Santa Claus.Presents from the tree ,crackers ,sandwiches,cakes,jellies schooldays are a long way ahead.
